invoiceHeader.description: Contains all header information for the invoice document, including order details, vendor information, dates, and financial summaries.

orderNumber.description: Sales order number (keep as string to preserve formatting such as leading zeros or prefixes). Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'SO-019482'

bolNumber.description: The Bill of Lading number that serves as a receipt and contract between the carrier and shipper for the transported goods. (nullable). Example: null

vendorNumber.description: A unique identifier assigned to the vendor in the buyer's system for tracking and accounting purposes. (nullable). Example: null

vendorName.description: The legal business name of the vendor or supplier who issued the invoice. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'House Foods Holding USA, Inc'

invoiceNumber.description: A unique identifier for the invoice document, formatted with a prefix 'IN-' followed by an alphanumeric sequence. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'IN-D000136'

invoiceDate.description: The date when the invoice was issued, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD Example: '2025-08-28'

purchaseOrderNumber.description: The buyer's purchase order number that authorized the purchase of goods or services referenced in the invoice. PO number as string to preserve leading zeros. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: '218411100'

branch.description: A numeric code identifying the specific branch location of the buyer involved in the transaction. 3-digit branch code. Constraints - pattern: ^\d{3}$. Example: '003'

warehouse.description: A numeric code identifying the specific warehouse where goods are shipped to or from. 3-digit warehouse code. Constraints - pattern: ^\d{3}$. Example: '026'

discountAmount.description: The total monetary amount of any discounts applied to the invoice, expressed as a numeric value with up to one decimal place. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 0.0

discountDate.description: The date by which payment must be made to qualify for an early payment discount, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD when applicable. nullable.  Example: null

freightAmount.description: The monetary charge for shipping and handling the goods, expressed as a numeric value. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 0

totalAmount.description: The final invoice amount including all line items, taxes, and additional charges, expressed as a numeric value with up to one decimal place. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 2675.2

subtotalAmount.description: The sum of all line item amounts before any taxes, discounts, or additional charges are applied, expressed as a numeric value with up to one decimal place. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 2675.2

address.description: The street address line for the shipping destination. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'CO PKMS 22000 East 38th Ave'

city.description: The city name for the shipping destination. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'AURORA'

state.description: The state or province code for the shipping destination, typically represented as a two-letter abbreviation. 2-letter US state code. Constraints - pattern: ^[A-Z]{2}$. Example: 'CO'

zip.description: The postal code for the shipping destination, which may include a hyphen for extended ZIP+4 codes.  Constraints - pattern: ^\d{5}(-\d{4})?$. Example: '80019-3608'

shippingAddress.description: The physical address where the goods are to be delivered.

address.description: The street address or PO Box line for remitting payment. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'PO Box #25765'

city.description: The city name for the remittance address. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'Pasadena'

state.description: The state or province code for the remittance address, typically represented as a two-letter abbreviation. Constraints - pattern: ^[A-Z]{2}$. Example: 'CA'

zip.description: The postal code for the remittance address, which may include a hyphen for extended ZIP+4 codes. Constraints - pattern: ^\d{5}(-\d{4})?$. Example: '91185-5765'

remittanceAddress.description: The address where payment for the invoice should be sent.

termsDiscountPercentage.description: The percentage discount offered for early payment, expressed as a numeric value when applicable. e.g., 2 for 2% discount; nullable. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: null

termsDiscountDueDays.description: The number of days after the invoice date within which payment must be made to qualify for the early payment discount. nullable. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: null

termsNetDuedays.description: The number of days after the invoice date within which full payment is due. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 30

paymentTerms.description: The conditions under which payment for the invoice is expected.

lineItems.description: An array of items purchased as part of this invoice, with each item containing detailed product and pricing information. Constraints - minItems: 1

lineNumber.description: A sequential number identifying the position of the item in the invoice, starting from 1.

productCode.description: A unique identifier for the product being purchased, which may be alphanumeric. Constraints - minLength: 1. Example: 'SNTC', 'K475', 'K502'

uom.description: The unit of measure for the product, indicating how the product is quantified (e.g., CASE, EACH, BOX). Constraints - minLength: 1.

quantityShipped.description: The number of units of the product that were shipped, expressed as a numeric value with up to one decimal place. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 4.0, 140.0, 20.0

weightShipped.description: The weight of the shipped product, expressed as a numeric value with up to one decimal place. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 0.0

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the product, expressed as a numeric value with up to two decimal places. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 54.0, 11.28, 44.0

lineTotal.description: The total monetary amount for this line item, calculated as quantity multiplied by unit price, expressed as a numeric value with up to one decimal place. Constraints - minimum: 0. Example: 216.0, 1579.2, 880.0

flags.description: A status indicator for the invoice, with 'OK' indicating the invoice has been processed successfully without issues.

barcodes.description: An array of barcode values associated with the invoice, typically containing the invoice number for scanning and tracking purposes.
